General.Name: CCS Supply Chain Management Co Ltd
General.Description: CCS Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd. engages in the supply chain management business in China and internationally. The company provides industrial internet vertical platform for trading of coal, oil, agricultural, and building material products; and smart data ecological platform that promotes the digitization of industrial chain through technical means, creates, accumulates, and integrates industrial data, as well as provides data and technology services to industrial platform enterprises and industrial chain customers. It also engages in the thermal coal and coking coal business. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. CCS Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Zhengzhou Ruimaotong Supply Chain Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Zhuangsheng Central Office Building, Beijing, China, 100052

2.Name: Ms. Ju Fang  Zhang
